name: User Authentication System Test
description:
GIVEN: A user with valid credentials
WHEN: The user attempts to log into the system
THEN: The user is successfully authenticated and redirected to the dashboard

name: Password Security System Test
description:
GIVEN: A user changing their password
WHEN: The new password is submitted
THEN: The password is encrypted and stored securely in the database

name: Database Connection Failure Test
description:
GIVEN: The database server is unavailable
WHEN: The application attempts to connect to the database
THEN: The system displays an appropriate error message and continues to function in offline mode

name: Input Validation End-to-End Test
description: System test to verify that malicious input is properly handled throughout the entire application flow

name: Session Timeout System Test
description:
GIVEN: A user is logged into the system
WHEN: The user remains inactive for the configured timeout period
THEN: The user session expires and the user is redirected to the login page

name: Multi-User Concurrent Access Test
description: System test to verify that multiple users can access the system simultaneously without conflicts

name: Configuration Management System Test
description:
GIVEN: The system configuration file is updated
WHEN: The application is restarted
THEN: The new configuration values are loaded and applied correctly
purpose: Verify that configuration changes are properly applied across the entire system
acceptance: All system components use the updated configuration values after restart
